DOC.brief_summary: To determine efficacy measure complication prophylactic anticoagulation use low-molecular weight heparin adult cancer patient palliative care
DOC.brief_title: Prophylaxis Venous Thrombo-Embolism Cancer Patients Under Palliative Care
DOC.criteria: Cancer patient palliative care Patients fully informed condition Signed informed consent No exclusion criterion Absence advance cancer Cancer previously cure Venous thromboembolism diagnose within 6 month prior inclusion Absence discerning capacity Active antithrombotic treatment heparin coumarines Thrombocytopenia < 50G/l PTT > 45sec TP < 35 % Active bleeding Renal failure < 20ml/min Past history heparininduced thrombocytopenia
